abstract: DreamWorks Animation says it will cut its movie production and lay off 500 employees, or 19 percent of its staff.
lead_paragraph: The studio said it had to lay off hundreds of employees and make fewer movies to “ensure the consistent and profitable delivery” of films.
snippet: The studio said it had to lay off hundreds of employees and make fewer movies to “ensure the consistent and profitable delivery” of films.

headline.main: DreamWorks Animation Cuts Its Staff and Output
headline.print_headline: Dream Works Cuts Its Staff and Output
